ocm.software.open-component-model.bindin.title: LayerSelector
ocm.software.open-component-model.bindin.description: LayerSelector allows selecting layers based on index, mediatype, and annotations.

matchExpressions.description:
MatchExpressions is a list of selectors. The selectors are ANDed together.
Use predefined keys like 'layer.index' and 'layer.mediaType' for built-in properties.

matchProperties.description:
MatchProperties is a map of {key,value} pairs. A single {key,value} in the matchLabels
map is equivalent to an element of matchExpressions, whose key field is "key", the
operator is "In", and the value array contains only "value".

ocm.software.open-component-model.bindin.title: LayerSelectorRequirement
ocm.software.open-component-model.bindin.description: LayerSelectorRequirement represents a single requirement for layer selection.

key.description:
Key is the property key that the selector applies to.
Can be a custom annotation key or predefined keys like layer.index, layer.mediaType.

operator.description: Operator represents the relationship between the key and values.

values.description:
Values is an array of string values. If the operator is In or NotIn,
the value array must be non-empty. If the operator is Exists or DoesNotExist,
the value array must be empty.

ocm.software.open-component-model.bindin.title: Rule
ocm.software.open-component-model.bindin.description:
Rule represents a rule for extracting selected layers to a target file.
Multiple layer selectors can be specified to select different layers that should
be merged into the same output file. For now, the first matching selector is used.

filename.description: Filename is the target filename for the extracted layers.

layerSelectors.description:
LayerSelectors defines multiple selection criteria for layers to include in this file.
Layers matching any of these selectors will be included.
